subject: Olympic Games
Doping
lead_paragraph: The British sprinter Dwain Chambers twice ran within the “A” qualifying time for the Beijing Games, a result he hoped would strengthen his appeal of a doping ban. Chambers finished in 10.06 seconds to win the 100 meters at the Weltklasse meet in Biberach, Germany.
